title: Villa de Los Villares
description: A Roman villa about 200 meters south of the center of the modern village of Santervas del Burgo and about 100 meters south of the left bank of the river Cejos.

properties.description: Point representing the location of the visible remains of Villa de los Villares, derived from an OpenStreetMap Node.
properties.title: OSM location of Yacimiento villa romana de Los Villares
